comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: The Hyper-V module isn't maintained by the PowerShell team themselves; you'll need to submit a UserVoice or Windows Feedback ticket for this one, I think.

comments.author: anmenaga
comments.body:
Some thoughts...
1) Looks like [minikube](https://github.com/kubernetes/minikube) is currently using Windows PowerShell. Somebody should advise minikube folks to switch to PowerShell Core / releases of this repo. Windows PowerShell (unlike this repo / PS Core) is basically in maintenance mode at this point and only taking high-impact security fixes.
2) As continuation from the previous point - this issue, being a problem with Windows PowerShell, does Not belong to this repo.
3) As an idea: try comparing `$Env:PSModulePath` on machines where scenario works and where it doesn't.
